TopicTitle: Say Hello to the White Bar Group!

Articles.Content:
> 
> Accidentally pressed save in my settings and didn't notice. Your true king returns, White Iron Crown!

ALL HAIL WHITE IRON CROWN!!! notcaps.

- - - Updated - - -

*Come to the dar... errr, white side... we have cookies. Vanilla cookies...*

> 
> Okay, so first, go to your settings menu.
> Then, under "My Settings" over on the left, there should be "General Settings" then, under "Login & Privacy" there should be "Show/Hide reputation".
> 
> Also, we seem to have lost many of our fellow white barrers, have hope, 'tis nothing but a fad.

Nope. I got invisible mode and vcard download, that's all...
Vanilla Cookies? Still not earning rep? Then I guess I'm back in!

> 
> Nope. I got invisible mode and vcard download, that's all...

Strange. I don't know what's happening.

> 
> Vanilla Cookies? Still not earning rep? Then I guess I'm back in!

Welcome back! Ohh, a replica! I... must... rep... all... replicas...

> 
> Strange. I don't know what's happening.

See?

> Meh, why not. I'll hop on for the cookies. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Welcome! 

![550_RU204509.jpg](http://images.meredith.com/bhg/images/recipe/550_RU204509.jpg)

Rep is like cookies, it has white side, green side.
I have joined, so far it is not as good as the light green group.

> 
> Welcome! 
> [http://images.meredith.com/bhg/images/recipe/550_RU204509.jpg](http://images.meredith.com/bhg/images/recipe/550_RU204509.jpg)
> 
> Rep is like cookies, it has white side, green side.

But you forget the forsaken red side, on the edge of the metaphorical cookie!

Also, the actual cookie itself could be represented as the grey side, either those with no rep or those who have only spectated. 

And the green side should get lighter near the middle, to represent the Light Green Group.

Aaand now I'm hungry for rainbow cookies. I hope you're happy with what you have done.

Shoes.

Rep is like shoes, it has many colors.

Indeed, the entire Google images page is shoes. Strangely enough however, the actual search shows a list of flags.
